frontMatter.title: Length of an array
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to find the length of an array

contentHtml:
Write a programme to find the length of an array

Input  : [ 1, 2, 3 ]
Output : 3
markdown:
## Write a programme to find the length of an array

```txt
Input  : [ 1, 2, 3 ]
Output : 3
```

---
